title: ISic003440. I.Sicily inscription 003440
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΘΕΟΔΩΡΕ
2ΧΡΗΣΤΕΚΑΙ
3ΑΜΕΜΠΤΕ

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Cordano 2014

translation

O Teodoro buono e irreprensibile.

English translation

O good and blameless Theodoros.

commentary
